scenes.description: The camera pans over a jazz club-style stage set with a piano, drums, and a double bass.
Vestia Zeta and Kazama Iroha perform the song "Gaze on Me!" on stage.
MC section on stage after the performance. Zeta and Iroha congratulate each other and discuss the 3D set.
They walk to a different area of the room that looks like a cafe.

subtitles.original: 揺らせ一秒 駆けだしたら Summer girls
subtitles.english: Shake it for a second, once we start running, summer girls

subtitles.original: 夢への道はストレート
subtitles.english: The road to dreams is straight

subtitles.original: 視線 誰にも 譲れない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone else have your gaze

subtitles.original: Please, Gaze on Me! きっと始まる Fantastic time
subtitles.english: Please, Gaze on Me! A fantastic time is sure to begin

subtitles.original: ゴールは Spotlight
subtitles.english: The goal is the spotlight

subtitles.original: I'm the heroine
subtitles.english: I'm the heroine

subtitles.original: キミを頂戴
subtitles.english: I want you

subtitles.original: Please, Gaze on Me! きっと始まる Fantastic time
subtitles.english: Please, Gaze on Me! A fantastic time is sure to begin

subtitles.original: みんな準備はいいですか？ Burning
subtitles.english: Are you all ready? Burning

subtitles.original: うなずいて 陽炎も Heat up
subtitles.english: Nod along, even the heat haze is heating up

subtitles.original: どうしよう 上昇 アガる空気 Let's go
subtitles.english: What should I do? The air is rising and getting excited, let's go

subtitles.original: さぁ太陽 燃えて最高
subtitles.english: Now, sun, burn, it's the best

subtitles.original: Mate 負けられない 興奮もハートも
subtitles.english: Mate, I can't lose, my excitement and heart,

subtitles.original: 駆け引きは No no
subtitles.english: no mind games

subtitles.original: Gate 開いたなら 一瞬のドラマ
subtitles.english: Gate, once it opens, it's a momentary drama

subtitles.original: 走れ 夏の方へ！
subtitles.english: Run towards the summer!

subtitles.original: 揺らせ一秒 駆けだしたら Summer girls
subtitles.english: Shake it for a second, once we start running, summer girls

subtitles.original: 夢への道はストレート
subtitles.english: The road to dreams is straight

subtitles.original: 視線 誰にも 譲れない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone else have your gaze

subtitles.original: Please, Gaze on Me! きっと沸き立つ Fantastic time
subtitles.english: Please, Gaze on Me! A fantastic time is sure to surge

subtitles.original: ゴールは Spotlight
subtitles.english: The goal is the spotlight

subtitles.original: I'm the heroine
subtitles.english: I'm the heroine

subtitles.original: キミを頂戴
subtitles.english: I want you

subtitles.original: Please, Gaze on Me! きっと沸き立つ Fantastic time
subtitles.english: Please, Gaze on Me! A fantastic time is sure to surge

subtitles.original: 絶対 最上 掴みたい Feeling
subtitles.english: Absolutely top-tier, the feeling I want to grasp

subtitles.original: 全身全霊 めぐるから Get hot
subtitles.english: With all my heart and soul, it's circulating, so get hot

subtitles.original: テンション 高揚 欲しいモノへ
subtitles.english: Tension, exhilaration, towards what I want

subtitles.original: 今 Ride on time 待ってて It's show time
subtitles.english: Now ride on time, wait for it, it's show time

subtitles.original: Peak 迎えるとき 迂回はいらない
subtitles.english: When reaching the peak, no detours are needed,

subtitles.original: せめぎあい Oh oh
subtitles.english: clashing with each other

subtitles.original: Spark 汗とプライド ジレた運命
subtitles.english: Spark, sweat and pride, an impatient fate

subtitles.original: 連れて 夏の方へ
subtitles.english: Take me towards the summer

subtitles.original: 挑む世界は 魅惑の Sunlight floor
subtitles.english: The world I challenge is the captivating sunlight floor

subtitles.original: 天井知らずのボルテージ
subtitles.english: Voltage that knows no bounds

subtitles.original: 火照る季節を モノにして
subtitles.english: Make the flushed season your own

subtitles.original: Please, Gaze on Me! クラリさせたい Exciting time
subtitles.english: Please, Gaze on Me! I want to make you dizzy in this exciting time

subtitles.original: ゴールは Spotlight
subtitles.english: The goal is the spotlight

subtitles.original: I'm the heroine
subtitles.english: I'm the heroine

subtitles.original: キミを頂戴
subtitles.english: I want you

subtitles.original: Please, Gaze on Me! クラリさせたい Exciting time
subtitles.english: Please, Gaze on Me! I want to make you dizzy in this exciting time

subtitles.original: 関係ない どんな私だって
subtitles.english: It doesn't matter, no matter what kind of me

subtitles.original: 真夏 駆けだせたら Venus
subtitles.english: In midsummer, if I can start running, Venus

subtitles.original: アツくなれば 一歩で Change & Happy
subtitles.english: If it gets hot, one step to change and happy

subtitles.original: 眩しすぎる今日を 踊るように手に入れよう
subtitles.english: Let's seize this too-bright today as if dancing

subtitles.original: さぁ Here we go!
subtitles.english: Now, here we go!

subtitles.original: ビートは止まらない
subtitles.english: The beat won't stop

subtitles.original: Keep 思うままに 身を預けて
subtitles.english: Keep entrusting your body as you please

subtitles.original: 灼熱へ Go go
subtitles.english: Into the scorching heat, go go

subtitles.original: Warp 本能のリズム 打ち鳴らして
subtitles.english: Warp, sounding out the rhythm of instinct

subtitles.original: 走れ 夏の方へ！
subtitles.english: Run towards the summer!

subtitles.original: 揺らせ一秒 駆けだしたら Summer girls
subtitles.english: Shake it for a second, once we start running, summer girls

subtitles.original: 夢への道はストレート
subtitles.english: The road to dreams is straight

subtitles.original: 視線 誰にも 譲れない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone else have your gaze

subtitles.original: Please, Gaze on Me! きっと始まる Fantastic time
subtitles.english: Please, Gaze on Me! A fantastic time is sure to begin

subtitles.original: ゴールは Spotlight
subtitles.english: The goal is the spotlight

subtitles.original: I'm the heroine
subtitles.english: I'm the heroine

subtitles.original: キミを頂戴
subtitles.english: I want you

subtitles.original: Please, Gaze on Me! きっと始まる Fantastic time
subtitles.english: Please, Gaze on Me! A fantastic time is sure to begin

subtitles.original: うわー！ こんかざー！ ゼータ 3D おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Wha-! Konkaza-! Zeta, congrats on your 3D!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！ 来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thanks for coming!

subtitles.original: 呼んでくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thanks for inviting me!

subtitles.original: ありがとう、ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you.

subtitles.original: あ、か、可愛いでござる、3D！
subtitles.english: Ah, c-cute, in 3D-de gozaru!

subtitles.original: えへへ。 先輩も可愛い！
subtitles.english: Ehehe. You're cute too, Senpai!

subtitles.original: うわー、やったー。 お揃い、ついに 3D。 一緒、一緒。 嬉しいでござる！
subtitles.english: Whoa, yay! Matching 3Ds, finally. Together, together. I'm so happy-de gozaru!

subtitles.original: 私も嬉しい！
subtitles.english: I'm happy too!

subtitles.original: お洋服も可愛いけど、ねぇ、このステージもすごいおしゃれでござるな。
subtitles.english: The clothes are cute, but hey, this stage is really stylish too-de gozaru.

subtitles.original: ステージいいよね、広いよね。 めっちゃおしゃれ。
subtitles.english: The stage is great, right? It's spacious. Very stylish.

subtitles.original: ちなみに、あっちの方には何があるでござるか？
subtitles.english: By the way, what's over that way-de gozaru?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、案内するよ。
subtitles.english: Then, I'll show you around.

subtitles.original: 案内してくれる？
subtitles.english: You'll show me?

subtitles.original: やった！ 行こう、行こう、行こう！
subtitles.english: Yay! Let's go, let's go, let's go!

subtitles.original: うわぁぁぁぁ！
subtitles.english: Waaaaah!

subtitles.original: おぉ、すごい！
subtitles.english: Oh, amazing!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ広い！
subtitles.english: It's so spacious!
